message.content:
cs.CE, cs.MS, cs.NA, cs.CM, cs.GR 

Reasoning: 
- cs.CE (Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science): The paper presents a Python package for post-processing of computational fluid dynamics simulations, which falls under the scope of computational engineering. 
- cs.MS (Mathematical Software): The paper discusses the implementation and architecture of the package, which involves mathematical algorithms and software development. 
- cs.NA (Numerical Analysis): The paper deals with numerical analysis of fluid flow simulations and includes routines for data extraction and visualization. 
- cs.CM (Computational Geometry): The package uses the Visualization Toolkit (VTK) for post-processing of simulations performed on unstructured meshes, which involves computational geometry. 
- cs.GR (Graphics): The package includes several matplotlib-based functions for creating highly customizable, publication-quality plots, which falls under the scope of computer graphics.
